alert.note: Alert for Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 4:11PM EDT until May 09 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following county, Tyler. * WHEN...Until 1245 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding along Middle Island Creek and it`s tributaries is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 408 PM EDT, gauge reports indicate flooding along Middle Island Creek and it`s tributaries. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Middlebourne. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
